modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_FIRESTORM_SHOTGUN_PLATE
modeffect.effect:
[ORANGE]Firestorm mod[GRAY]
Increases knockback and does
extra close range damage.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_SNIPERMOD_SPLITSCAN
modeffect.effect:
[PURPLE]Sniper mod[GRAY]
Fires two half-strength shots at the same time.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_SNIPERMOD_JACKHAMMER
modeffect.effect: [PURPLE]Sniper mod[GRAY]\nFires a huge horizontal spread of fixed shots.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_SNIPERMOD_RAILGUN
modeffect.effect:
[PURPLE]Sniper mod[GRAY]
Railgun trails have an
incredible amount of knockback.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_SNIPERMOD_MYSTERIOUSMAGNUM
modeffect.effect:
[PURPLE]Sniper mod[GRAY]
Greatly increased damage, but
no mysteriousness remains in the gun.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_SNIPERMOD_FRAGSHOTGUN
modeffect.effect:
[PURPLE]Sniper mod[GRAY]
Increases the amount of pellets
and increases damage + accuracy.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_SNIPERMOD_LIGHTWEAVER
modeffect.effect:
[PURPLE]Sniper mod[GRAY]
Altfire changes into a powerful
accelerating super bolt.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_SNIPERMOD_TRIGUN
modeffect.effect:
[PURPLE]Sniper mod[GRAY]
Each successful shot increases
damage by 100. lost if you miss or reload.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_SNIPERMOD_GRAMMATONCLERICBERETTA
modeffect.effect:
[PURPLE]Sniper mod[GRAY]
Burst and auto modes fire
all shots in one attack.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_SNIPERMOD_TANTRUMCANNON
modeffect.effect:
[PURPLE]Sniper mod[GRAY]
Releases homing projectiles when bouncing off walls.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_SNIPERMOD_REVENANTSLAUNCHER
modeffect.effect:
[PURPLE]Sniper mod[GRAY]
Can fire up to 8 missiles
rapidly before reloading.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_SNIPERMOD_NULLPOINTER
modeffect.effect:
[PURPLE]Sniper mod[GRAY]
Fires a slow moving null field
that paralyzes nearby enemies.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_SNIPERMOD_PARTICLEBEAMCANNON
modeffect.effect:
[PURPLE]Sniper mod[GRAY]
Fire a triple strength beam
for the gun's entire charge.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_SNIPERMOD_PLASMAREDIRECTIONCANNON
modeffect.effect:
[PURPLE]Sniper mod[GRAY]
Shots bounce off walls three
times instead of once.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_SNIPERMOD_STEELBEAST
modeffect.effect:
[PURPLE]Sniper mod[GRAY]
Fires a single, highly accurate
explosive slug.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_SNIPERMOD_SUSSGUN
modeffect.effect:
[PURPLE]Sniper mod[GRAY]
Shots rebound slightly towards enemies off of surfaces.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_SNIPERMOD_CHAMELEONRIFLE
modeffect.effect:
[PURPLE]Sniper mod[GRAY]
Unlocks 'Energetic' config
Fires a five-shot plasma burst.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_SNIPERMOD_NUCLEARONSLAUGHT
modeffect.effect:
[PURPLE]Sniper mod[GRAY]
Slowly fires powerful beams for
1/2 ammo clip each
(Both guns)

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_SNIPERMOD_TRIADCANNON
modeffect.effect:
[PURPLE]Sniper mod[GRAY]
Fires cluster missiles that can be detonated remotely.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_SNIPERMOD_DIRECTHIT
modeffect.effect:
[PURPLE]Sniper mod[GRAY]
Does critical damage to airborne enemies.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_SNIPERMOD_DEATHSGAZE
modeffect.effect:
[PURPLE]Sniper mod[GRAY]
Shots that hit enemies give you
stacking resistance.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_SNIPERMOD_SOULSTORMRIFLE
modeffect.effect:
[PURPLE]Sniper mod[GRAY]
Fires bolts that home in on
enemies after impacting surfaces.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_SNIPERMOD_JUDGEOFTHEDEAD
modeffect.effect:
[PURPLE]Sniper mod[GRAY]
Explosions increase in size instead of decreasing.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_SNIPERMOD_HURRICANECANNON
modeffect.effect:
[PURPLE]Sniper mod[GRAY]
Fires three rockets at once in a massive arc.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_SNIPERMOD_NEURALSTUNNER
modeffect.effect:
[PURPLE]Sniper mod[GRAY]
Fires a beam instead of a blast.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_SNIPERMOD_LONGHORN
modeffect.effect:
[PURPLE]Sniper mod[GRAY]
Shooting an enemy will cause them to drop health bonuses on death.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_SNIPERMOD_DRAGONSLAYER
modeffect.effect:
[PURPLE]Sniper mod[GRAY]
Swinging the sword will instill fear in your enemies.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_FIRESTORMMOD_CLOSEPOWER
modeffect.effect:
[ORANGE]Firestorm mod[GRAY]
Increases knockback and does
extra close range damage.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_FIRESTORMMOD_JACKHAMMER
modeffect.effect:
[ORANGE]Firestorm mod[GRAY]
Fires an explosive slug along with the normal pellets.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_FIRESTORMMOD_MYSTERIOUSMAGNUM
modeffect.effect:
[ORANGE]Firestorm mod[GRAY]
Chance of mysterious effects is
100% after reloading.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_FIRESTORMMOD_FRAGSHOTGUN
modeffect.effect:
[ORANGE]Firestorm mod[GRAY]
One ammo per shot, lower
damage, and full auto fire mode.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_FIRESTORMMOD_QUADSHOTGUN
modeffect.effect:
[ORANGE]Firestorm mod[GRAY]
Does massive pointblank damage
and gibs enemies with it.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_FIRESTORMMOD_LIGHTWEAVER
modeffect.effect:
[ORANGE]Firestorm mod[GRAY]
Damages enemies in front of
you while recharging.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_FIRESTORMMOD_TRIGUN
modeffect.effect:
[ORANGE]Firestorm mod[GRAY]
Fires three shots with a fixed
horizontal spread.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_FIRESTORMMOD_GRAMMATONCLERICBERETTA
modeffect.effect:
[ORANGE]Firestorm mod[GRAY]
Enemies you shoot will take
25% more damage for 5 seconds.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_FIRESTORMMOD_REVENANTSLAUNCHER
modeffect.effect:
[ORANGE]Firestorm mod[GRAY]
Changes to a Heavy Revenant's
large missile launcher.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_FIRESTORMMOD_NULLPOINTER
modeffect.effect:
[ORANGE]Firestorm mod[GRAY]
Creates multiple small null
fields on enemies in front of
you.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_FIRESTORMMOD_PLASMAREDIRECTIONCANNON
modeffect.effect:
[ORANGE]Firestorm mod[GRAY]
Shots explode into smaller 
plasma blasts which seek 
enemies.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_FIRESTORMMOD_STEELBEAST
modeffect.effect:
[ORANGE]Firestorm mod[GRAY]
Fires a huge amount of low
damage pellets with a wide spread.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_FIRESTORMMOD_CHAMELEONRIFLE
modeffect.effect:
[ORANGE]Firestorm mod[GRAY]
Unlocks 'Hellish' config
Fires a grenade, detonating in a
ring of flame.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_FIRESTORMMOD_LUCIFERCANNON
modeffect.effect:
[ORANGE]Firestorm mod[GRAY]
Projectile explosions will not harm you,gun cannot overload.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_FIRESTORMMOD_TRIADCANNON
modeffect.effect:
[ORANGE]Firestorm mod[GRAY]
Missile impacts unleash waves of fire in all directions.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_FIRESTORMMOD_DEATHSGAZE
modeffect.effect:
[ORANGE]Firestorm mod[GRAY]
Shots that hit enemies cause
them to emit mini explosions.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_FIRESTORMMOD_SOULSTORMRIFLE
modeffect.effect:
[ORANGE]Firestorm mod[GRAY]
Has a chance of firing
lasers for 6 seconds.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_FIRESTORMMOD_JUDGEOFTHEDEAD
modeffect.effect:
[ORANGE]Firestorm mod[GRAY]
Fires shots that split into a four-way cross of explosions.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_FIRESTORMMOD_HURRICANECANNON
modeffect.effect:
[ORANGE]Firestorm mod[GRAY]
No longer uses ammo, but fires fairly weak fireballs instead.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_FIRESTORMMOD_NEURALSTUNNER
modeffect.effect:
[ORANGE]Firestorm mod[GRAY]
Shots do double damage and
stun for a longer time.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_FIRESTORMMOD_BARONBLASTER
modeffect.effect:
[ORANGE]Firestorm mod[GRAY]
Shots explode into smaller shots,
which explode into tiny shots.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_FIRESTORMMOD_LONGHORN
modeffect.effect:
[ORANGE]Firestorm mod[GRAY]
Shooting an enemy will cause them to explode on death.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_FIRESTORMMOD_DRAGONSLAYER
modeffect.effect:
[ORANGE]Firestorm mod[GRAY]
Replaces your altfire attack with a spin attack.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_NANOMOD_JACKHAMMER
modeffect.effect: [WHITE]Nano mod[GRAY]\nGains 3 extra shots whenever you kill something with it.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_NANOMOD_RAILGUN
modeffect.effect:
[WHITE]Nano mod[GRAY]
Uses 2 cells per shot
instead of 5 cells.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_NANOMOD_FRAGSHOTGUN
modeffect.effect:
[WHITE]Nano mod[GRAY]
The lower your health, the
higher the chance of not using ammo.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_NANOMOD_LIGHTWEAVER
modeffect.effect:
[WHITE]Nano mod[GRAY]
Gives you cell ammo whenever it
recharges.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_NANOMOD_GRAMMATONCLERICBERETTA
modeffect.effect:
[WHITE]Nano mod[GRAY]
All missed shots do not
expend ammo.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_NANOMOD_ANTIFREAKJACKAL
modeffect.effect:
[WHITE]Nano mod[GRAY]
Context sensitive plot gun that
has as much ammo as is needed.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_NANOMOD_HELLSINGARMSCASULL
modeffect.effect:
[WHITE]Nano mod[GRAY]
Context sensitive plot gun that
has as much ammo as is needed.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_NANOMOD_TANTRUMCANNON
modeffect.effect:
[WHITE]Nano mod[GRAY]
Fires four smaller shots with
the main shot.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_NANOMOD_REVENANTSLAUNCHER
modeffect.effect:
[WHITE]Nano mod[GRAY]
Changes to a Nightmare Revenants
skullblast launchers.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_NANOMOD_SUSSGUN
modeffect.effect:
[WHITE]Nano mod[GRAY]
Shots rip through enemies, but
do decreased damage.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_NANOMOD_MIRVLAUNCHER
modeffect.effect:
[WHITE]Nano mod[GRAY]
Extra missiles are fired the
longer the trigger is held.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_NANOMOD_MARATHONSHOTGUNS
modeffect.effect:
[WHITE]Nano mod[GRAY]
Pellets that hit enemies
can restore ammo.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_NANOMOD_CHAMELEONRIFLE
modeffect.effect:
[WHITE]Nano mod[GRAY]
Unlocks 'Ironwind' config
Inaccurate autofire, but
increases fire rate as trigger 
is held.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_NANOMOD_NUCLEARONSLAUGHT
modeffect.effect:
[WHITE]Nano mod[GRAY]
Rapid-fires erratic bolts (Left gun)
Fires a plasma blast (Right gun)

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_NANOMOD_DIRECTHIT
modeffect.effect:
[WHITE]Nano mod[GRAY]
Hitting an enemy will reload a shot automatically.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_NANOMOD_DEATHSGAZE
modeffect.effect:
[WHITE]Nano mod[GRAY]
Shots that hit enemies give
you bonus health.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_NANOMOD_SOULSTORMRIFLE
modeffect.effect:
[WHITE]Nano mod[GRAY]
Reloading halves current health
of enemies close to user.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_NANOMOD_JUDGEOFTHEDEAD
modeffect.effect:
[WHITE]Nano mod[GRAY]
Fires like a more accurate, much faster Super Shotgun.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_NANOMOD_HURRICANECANNON
modeffect.effect:
[WHITE]Nano mod[GRAY]
Chance of unleashing a damaging electric surge every shot.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_NANOMOD_NEURALSTUNNER
modeffect.effect:
[WHITE]Nano mod[GRAY]
Shots pull enemies in as
they fly by them.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_NANOMOD_BARONBLASTER
modeffect.effect:
[WHITE]Nano mod[GRAY]
Constantly sprays small, slow
plasma balls as it travels.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_NANOMOD_BFGINFINITY
modeffect.effect:
[WHITE]Nano mod[GRAY]
Energy cluster explodes into smaller clusters,
which explode into energy
scythes.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_NANOMOD_LONGHORN
modeffect.effect:
[WHITE]Nano mod[GRAY]
Generates a second revolver, allowing you to dual wield them.

modeffect.name: PDA_MODS_NANOMOD_DRAGONSLAYER
modeffect.effect:
[WHITE]Nano mod[GRAY]
Any kill will restore some health.
